Lore.title: Lore
Lore.genres: Non-fiction, Horror, Documentary, Folklore, Historical mysteries
Lore.summary: Explores mysterious creatures, tragic events, and unusual places from history—proving truth can be more frightening than fiction.

RedHanded.title: RedHanded
RedHanded.summary: Macabre madness... from big time serial killers to hauntings, possessions, disturbing mysteries.

The Magnus Archives.summary: Supernatural horror — archivist Jonathan Sims records statements of paranormal events, something starts to look back.

The Rest Is History.title: The Rest Is History

You Must Remember This.summary: Exploring the secret and/or forgotten histories of Hollywood’s first century. Deep-dive storytelling, thoroughly researched and narrated.

Revolutions.title: Revolutions
Revolutions.summary: Major historical revolutions of the modern world—each season covers a different revolution in exceptional depth.

Freakonomics Radio.title: Freakonomics Radio
Freakonomics Radio.genres: Economics, Social Science, Science, Human Behavior
Freakonomics Radio.summary: Uncovers the hidden side of everything—behavior, economics, life, and society. Mixing stories, science, and statistics.
